channel.title: Postgres Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Postgres.app 2.5.2
item.description:
We now include the address_standardizer extension again.

This update includes the following version of PostgreSQL:

  • PostgreSQL 12.9 with PostGIS 3.0.4

To save bandwidth, this automatic update only includes a bugfix updates for PostgreSQL 12. You can download newer versions from our website: postgresapp.com/downloads.html
